button.Name: Close

Textentry.name: Dropoff
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your dropoff location bookmark. If you are delivering to a personal or corporate hangar in a station, the bookmark needs to be a station. If you are delivering to a POS structure, the bookmark should be near the structure."]

listbox.Name: DropoffList
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your dropoff location bookmark. If you are delivering to a personal or corporate hangar in a station, the bookmark needs to be a station. If you are delivering to a POS structure, the bookmark should be near the structure."]

TextEntry.name: Dropoff_Container
TextEntry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["This field is used to supply ComBot with an identifier for your dropoff location. If you are delivering to an Orca, this needs to contain the name of the pilot flying your Orca. If you are delivering to a Player Owned Station structure, this needs to contain the structure's name. This field is also used to specify the prefix for corporate bookmarks created using the Corporate Jetcan mode."]

listbox.Name: DropoffSubType
listbox.OnLoad: switch ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Miner.Config.Dropoff_Type} { case Jetcan This:AddItem[Fleet Jetcan] switch ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Miner.Config.Dropoff_SubType} { case Corporate Bookmark Jetcan UIElement[Dropoff_Container@DropoffFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:Show UIElement[Dropoff_ContainerTitle@DropoffFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:Show UIElement[Dropoff_ContainerTitle@DropoffFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText[Jetcan Bookmark Prefix] break default UIElement[Dropoff_Container@DropoffFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:Hide UIElement[Dropoff_ContainerTitle@DropoffFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:Hide } break case Corporation Hangar This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break case Container This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break } This.ItemByText["${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Miner.Config.Dropoff_SubType}"]:Select
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["This field is used to further configure your dropoff type for types that have additional options, like Corporate Hangars and Jetcans."]

Text.name: ThresholdTitle

Slider.name: Threshold
Slider.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["This field is used to determine when ComBot should perform a dropoff."]

Listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["This field determines how ComBot should drop off ore after it is mined."]

TextEntry.name: MiningSystem
TextEntry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["This field needs to contain the name of a bookmark in the system in which you would like ComBot to mine. The bookmark can be a station, entity, or location - therefore if you are mining in the same system as your dropoff bookmark, you can use that here as well."]

listbox.Name: MiningSystemList
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["This field needs to contain the name of a bookmark in the system in which you would like ComBot to mine. The bookmark can be a station, entity, or location - therefore if you are mining in the same system as your dropoff bookmark, you can use that here as well."]

Textentry.name: OrePrefix
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["This field is to specify the prefix to use for your ore belt bookmarks. Any bookmark in the mining system which starts with this prefix will be used as a mining location for ore mining."]

Textentry.name: IcePrefix
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["This field is to specify the prefix to use for your ice belt bookmarks. Any bookmark in the mining system which starts with this prefix will be used as a mining location for ice mining."]

Checkbox.name: obj_MinerUseBookmarks
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["When this is checked, ComBot will warp to bookmarks instead of warping to the belts themselves. This usually results in greater productivity as you can determine where your miners will start operations in a belt instead of using the default warp-in, which is usually some distance away from the ore field. To use this option, you must have belt bookmarks created in your mining system and they must begin with the prefix specified below."]

Text.name: MaxLockTitle

Slider.name: MaxLock
Slider.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["This value is used to determine how many asteroids ComBot will lock when mining. It is usually best to set the value to correspond with how many mining lasers your ship is equipped with. However, if you have 8 mining lasers but can only lock 8 targets, it is usually best to set the value lower so the Drone module has target slots available to attack rats."]

listbox.Name: obj_MinerOrePriority
listbox.OnLeftClick:
variable settingsetref Ores variable int counter variable collection:bool selected
if ${UIElement[obj_MinerIceMining@@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner].Checked} { Ores:Set[${LavishSettings[ComBotSettings].FindSet[${Me.Name}].FindSet[Miner].FindSet[ICE_Types]}] Ores:Clear for ( counter:Set[1] ; ${counter} <= ${UIElement[obj_MinerOrePriority@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner].SelectedItems} ; counter:Inc ) { selected:Set[${UIElement[obj_MinerOrePriority@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner].SelectedItem[${counter}]},TRUE] } for ( counter:Set[1] ; ${counter} <= ${UIElement[obj_MinerOrePriority@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner].Items} ; counter:Inc ) { if ${selected[${UIElement[obj_MinerOrePriority@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner].OrderedItem[${counter}]}]} Ores:AddSetting[${UIElement[obj_MinerOrePriority@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner].OrderedItem[${counter}]},1] } } else { Ores:Set[${LavishSettings[ComBotSettings].FindSet[${Me.Name}].FindSet[Miner].FindSet[Ore_Types]}] Ores:Clear for ( counter:Set[1] ; ${counter} <= ${UIElement[obj_MinerOrePriority@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner].SelectedItems} ; counter:Inc ) { selected:Set[${UIElement[obj_MinerOrePriority@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner].SelectedItem[${counter}]},TRUE] } for ( counter:Set[1] ; ${counter} <= ${UIElement[obj_MinerOrePriority@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner].Items} ; counter:Inc ) { if ${selected[${UIElement[obj_MinerOrePriority@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner].OrderedItem[${counter}]}]} switch ${UIElement[obj_MinerOrePriority@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner].OrderedItem[${counter}]} { case Mercoxit Ores:AddSetting[Vitreous Mercoxit,1] Ores:AddSetting[Magma Mercoxit,1] Ores:AddSetting[Mercoxit,1] break case Arkonor Ores:AddSetting[Prime Arkonor,1] Ores:AddSetting[Crimson Arkonor,1] Ores:AddSetting[Arkonor,1] break case Bistot Ores:AddSetting[Monoclinic Bistot,1] Ores:AddSetting[Triclinic Bistot,1] Ores:AddSetting[Bistot,1] break case Crokite Ores:AddSetting[Crystalline Crokite,1] Ores:AddSetting[Sharp Crokite,1] Ores:AddSetting[Crokite,1] break case Spodumain Ores:AddSetting[Gleaming Spodumain,1] Ores:AddSetting[Bright Spodumain,1] Ores:AddSetting[Spodumain,1] break case Dark Ochre Ores:AddSetting[Obsidian Ochre,1] Ores:AddSetting[Onyx Ochre,1] Ores:AddSetting[Dark Ochre,1] break case Gneiss Ores:AddSetting[Prismatic Gneiss,1] Ores:AddSetting[Iridescent Gneiss,1] Ores:AddSetting[Gneiss,1] break case Hedbergite Ores:AddSetting[Glazed Hedbergite,1] Ores:AddSetting[Vitric Hedbergite,1] Ores:AddSetting[Hedbergite,1] break case Hemorphite Ores:AddSetting[Radiant Hemorphite,1] Ores:AddSetting[Vivid Hemorphite,1] Ores:AddSetting[Hemorphite,1] break case Jaspet Ores:AddSetting[Pristine Jaspet,1] Ores:AddSetting[Pure Jaspet,1] Ores:AddSetting[Jaspet,1] break case Kernite Ores:AddSetting[Fiery Kernite,1] Ores:AddSetting[Luminous Kernite,1] Ores:AddSetting[Kernite,1] break case Omber Ores:AddSetting[Golden Omber,1] Ores:AddSetting[Silvery Omber,1] Ores:AddSetting[Omber,1] break case Plagioclase Ores:AddSetting[Rich Plagioclase,1] Ores:AddSetting[Azure Plagioclase,1] Ores:AddSetting[Plagioclase,1] break case Pyroxeres Ores:AddSetting[Viscous Pyroxeres,1] Ores:AddSetting[Solid Pyroxeres,1] Ores:AddSetting[Pyroxeres,1] break case Scordite Ores:AddSetting[Massive Scordite,1] Ores:AddSetting[Condensed Scordite,1] Ores:AddSetting[Scordite,1] break case Veldspar Ores:AddSetting[Dense Veldspar,1] Ores:AddSetting[Concentrated Veldspar,1] Ores:AddSetting[Veldspar,1] break } } }
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["This list is used to determine priority for mining asteroids. Asteroid types which are higher on the list will receive higher priority for the targeting module."]

Textentry.name: GasPrefix
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["This field is to specify the prefix to use for your gas bookmarks. Any bookmark in the mining system which starts with this prefix will be used as a mining location for gas harvesting."]

Checkbox.name: obj_MinerIceMining
Checkbox.OnLeftClick:
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Miner.Config:SetIceMining[${This.Checked}] UIElement[obj_MinerOrePriority@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:ClearItems
variable int count variable settingsetref Ores variable collection:bool MineOre variable iterator iter
if ${This.Checked} { UIElement[GasHarvesting@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:Hide UIElement[OrePriorityTitle@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText[Ice Priority] UIElement[MaxLockTitle@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:Hide UIElement[MaxLock@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:Hide Ores:Set[${LavishSettings[ComBotSettings].FindSet[${Me.Name}].FindSet[Miner].FindSet[ICE_Types]}] if ${Ores(exists)} { Ores:GetSettingIterator[iter] if ${iter:First(exists)} { do { MineOre:Set[${iter.Value.Name},TRUE] switch ${iter.Value.Name} { case Dark Glitter UIElement[obj_MinerOrePriority@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:AddItem[Dark Glitter] UIElement[obj_MinerOrePriority@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner].Item[${UIElement[obj_MinerOrePriority@MiningFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner].Items}]:Select break case Gelidus Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["This toggles ice mining mode on or off. The ore priority list will change to correspond."]

Checkbox.name: obj_MinerOrcaMode
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["When checked, this changes how the Miner module behaves. Instead of mining asteroids, ComBot will simply attempt to keep within 8km (10km for ice mining) of the nearest asteroid. It will still follow the same behavior for dropoffs as it would if it were configured as a normal miner."]

Checkbox.name: Tether
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["When checked, this enables tether mode, allowing ComBot to tether your miner to another fleet member."]

Textentry.name: TetherName
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["This field should contain the exact name of the fleet member to whom you would like to tether."]

Checkbox.name: RenameCans
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["When checked, ComBot will rename jetcans after they are jettisoned with your corp ticker and current timestamp."]

Checkbox.name: ApproachPriority
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["When checked, ComBot will approachs asteroids based on your priority. When unchecked, ComBot will keep the nearest asteroid in range."]

Checkbox.name: DontMove
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Miner_Frame@ComBot_Miner]:SetText["When checked, ComBot will not move to approach asteroids."]
